titles: To day a man, to morrow none: or, Sir VValter Ravvleighs farewell to his lady, the night before hee was beheaded; together vvith his advice concerning her, and her sonne.
author: Raleigh, Walter, Sir, 1552?-1618.
notes: Annotation on Thomason copy: the 4 in imprint date is crossed out and altered to 1643; "January 16".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
